title: Uninstall PhpWebStudy
text1: 1. From the application, drag PhpWebStudy to the wastepaper basket to uninstall the application
text2: 2. If the application was installed using brew, you can uninstall it using the brew uninstall command: brew uninstall phpwebstudy
text3: 3. After the application is uninstalled, the original created site, database and other data will not be lost and will be loaded automatically after the next installation.
text4: 4. If you want to delete the data completely, just delete the ~/Library/PhpWebStudy folder, Note: After deleting, the host configuration and the configuration of each software will be lost, please be careful.
